extendedInfo.description: ABOUT POCKETPocket allows you to safely store all your sensitive data such as bank account details and passwords on your phone. Pocket is also useful for remembering all those bits and pieces of information in one place from frequent flier numbers to contact lens prescriptions.SECURE YOUR INFORMATIONPocket is all about security. Many people still store their sensitive information under contacts, which can easily be seen if your phone falls into the wrong hands...ouch! When you use Pocket, your data is encrypted using the industry standard AES-256. Only you will be able to access your data via a master password. Even if you lose your phone your data will still be safe. For extra security, Pocket doesn't store your master password locally on the device, but rather as a SHA-512 hash. In addition, Pocket self-locks after a timeout period and clears the clipboard to ensure your data is protected.ONLINE DROPBOX BACKUPPocket provides an option to automatically backup your wallet to your Dropbox account. All communication to Dropbox is over HTTPS and the data itself is encrypted so that even if your Dropbox account is compromised, your data is inaccessible without the master password.DESKTOP VERSIONNew beta desktop version now available. (Click 'Visit the developer's web page' for the download links).PRO VERSIONGet the PRO version key to remove ads.

reviews.title: The Best of the Best
reviews.comment: Fantastic app once again.  Have no issues whatsoever. Dropbox sync issue has been fixed by the dev. Great support. A must-have Android app!!
reviews.author: Nathan Wu

reviews.title: Great App for both my phone & my tablet
reviews.comment: It is so easy to use. Don\'t need a rocket scientist to learn this app. Best of all, it syncs with Dropbox then to your PC. I\'d consider a full version. Do I have to pay twice for both my phone and tablet?
reviews.author: Robert Cheung

reviews.title: Best password keeper
reviews.comment: I love this app. I have lost my phone and upgraded 2 two times,  each time I was able to download this app and sync it with Dropbox to retrieve my passwords.  Thanks
reviews.author: Brandi Brooks

reviews.title: Supurb App
reviews.comment: I have installed both mobile and desktop version. It is so easy to keep all important info safe and easily accessible. Pls provide configation menu in desktop version.
reviews.author: Kumar Iyer

reviews.title: Was very good but time just killed it.
reviews.comment: This one was my favorite password keeper but just was. There is no real upgrade for years the interface looked nice but now just some of vintage. There are no XHDPI resources so the app UI looks very blurry on current devices. Wallbase has nice fresh interface but here is nothing about Holo. Support simple not answer for my questions. Sync features not offer all current possibilities. I bought it long time before but even there are no new version for separate new cost. So seems the product is almost dead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best AGAIN
reviews.comment: Just updated the app and synched with Dropbox so everything is back to normal. Thanks Tim for the timely update, saved us much trouble trying to manually keep Pocket up to date on different platforms. Well done Tim
reviews.author: Thomas Regan

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Only oddity is that the export defaults to an unencrypted save format instead of the encrypted db (and warns you about danger after, even if export was encrypted).  Otherwise it is perfect.
reviews.author: Robert Anderson

reviews.title: Still great but tired
reviews.comment: Functionality has been great for years but could do with a new ui like ur Eye in the sky app. Safe in clouds looks 10 times better than this but doesn\'t work aswell. Lets get this looking as good dev.
reviews.author: Chris Richmond

reviews.title: The best app for keeping data secure
reviews.comment: Have been using Pocket since the last 3 years. Running it on my phone as well as on my PC synced via dropbox. Even now on a MacBook it works great, though need to compile the JAR to an APP file and make an icon.
reviews.author: Ali Diwan

reviews.title: Super useful
reviews.comment: Had this app since my first Android phone... It has saved my neck many times! I love that I never lose anything with its drop box thingiefeaturewhatever and I just love it soo much!
reviews.author: Evelyn C.

reviews.title: UI Destroyed with latest upgrade
reviews.comment: This was an excellent App until the latest upgrade. Now Pocket opens witha grey screen - no lists visible! No reply to emails from dev
reviews.author: Malcolm Harris

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Request: can you add a barcode function? Then can add all those membership/reward cards. So long Costanza!
reviews.author: Ming Ng

reviews.title: I\'d rather have individual Pro version instead of the key
reviews.comment: And without internet access at all. It wouldn\'t be so hard to keep backups manually, but safety first when speaking about such kind of apps, isn\'t it? Can I expect standalone Pocket Pro without unsafe permissions?

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: With all the passwords we have to have, and the increasing level of difficulty that is required, this app is perfect for keeping them close at hand and safe.
reviews.author: cynthia brannon

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does what it should. I\'m giving it five stars but i suggest the developers to add regular/scheduled back up feature
reviews.author: Natia Gvazava

reviews.title: This is a great app...
reviews.comment: But, recent problems have prompted me to seek an alternative. I have now bought \"Safe In Cloud\" as a replacement, if you export from pocket as an un encrypted xml file, Safe in Cloud can import it directly into the desktop app and all your details transfer seamlessly.
reviews.author: Carl Freeman

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: My sync prob solved. Thats why I changed rating to 5 stars. Thanks Tim Clark Yours  Rajesh E V
reviews.author: rajesh e v

reviews.title: Works like how it should
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app again. Thanks for fixing the sync issue.
reviews.author: Kenny Nguyen

reviews.title: Best password app out there
reviews.comment: Has everything you need. Dropbox sync,  Linux support, multiple fields entry, custom fields and an awesome hash encryption algorithm. Plain greatness.
reviews.author: Chepo Perez

reviews.title: The BEST!
reviews.comment: I have not been able to find free any app that compares, and the paid ones all require a subscription! Cmon, I\'m willing to pay if its worth it, but just once, and this one is free (with an inapp purchase to remove ads if you wany!
reviews.author: A Google User
